Statius's warhammer is a crush weapon requiring level 78 Strength to wield.

In Deadman seasonals, it is part of Statius's equipment, a set of Ancient Warriors' equipment, and is dropped by any monster found in the Wilderness as part of a global loot table, the chance being relative to the combat level of the monster.

Combat styles[edit | edit source]

Category: BluntCombat StyleStyle typeWeapon StyleExperienceInvisible Boost
PoundCrushAccurateAttack and Hitpoints+3 Attack
PummelCrushAggressiveStrength and Hitpoints+3 Strength
BlockCrushDefensiveDefence and Hitpoints+3 Defence

Special attack[edit | edit source]

A player performing Statius's warhammer's special attack.

Statius's warhammer has a special attack, Smash, that consumes 35% of the player's special attack energy and deals between 25% and 125% of the user's max hit, while lowering the target's current Defence level by 30% on a hit other than zero (the hit has to deal damage - even if it is a successful hit but rolls a zero, it does not work).

Defence level reductions do stack over multiple successful hits; each reduction is calculated from the current temporary level (so follow-up drains reduce fewer levels). Two successful special attacks thus reduce an opponent's Defence by a total of 51%.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)

The weapon's position on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be equipped properly.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Ancient Warriors' equipment were originally added in a 2008 update, a year after the backup of Old School RuneScape.
  • Unlike its original incarnation, it does not degrade.

[[File:Statius's warhammer detail.png|160px|left]]
'''Statius's warhammer''' is a crush weapon requiring level 78 [[Strength]] to wield. 

In [[Deadman Mode#Seasonals|Deadman seasonals]], it is part of [[Statius's equipment]], a set of [[Ancient Warriors' equipment]], and is dropped by any monster found in the [[Wilderness]] as part of a global loot table, the chance being relative to the combat level of the monster.

==Combat styles==
{{CombatStyles|Blunt}}

==Special attack==
[[File:Smash (Statius's warhammer).gif|thumb|250px|A player performing Statius's warhammer's special attack.]]
Statius's warhammer has a [[special attack]], ''Smash'', that consumes 35% of the player's [[special attack energy]] and deals between 25% and 125% of the user's max hit, while lowering the target's '''current''' [[Defence]] level by 30% on a hit other than zero (the hit has to deal damage - even if it is a [[successful hit]] but rolls a zero, it does not work).

Defence level reductions '''do stack''' over multiple successful hits; each reduction is calculated from the current temporary level (so follow-up drains reduce fewer levels). Two successful special attacks thus reduce an opponent's Defence by a total of 51%.

==Changes==
{{Subject changes header}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 7 July 2021
|update = Small Changes & Tweaks

|change = The weapon's position on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be equipped properly.
}}
{{Subject changes footer}}

==Trivia==
*[[Ancient Warriors' equipment]] were originally added in a 2008 {{RSL|Update:PvP Worlds|update}}, a year after the backup of ''Old School RuneScape''.
*Unlike its {{RSL|Statius's warhammer|original incarnation}}, it does not degrade.
